Module it.polimi.sw.GC50
Package it.polimi.sw.GC50.model.game

Class PlayerData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.GC50.model.game.PlayerData
public class PlayerData extends Object
Comprises game info with respect to a player, e.g. board, hand, score
